subject: Office of Federal Financial Ma
body:
Office of Federal Financial Management (OFFM)s
700 19th Street, NW Washington, D.C. 20431 USA.
 REF/OFFM/429/202/24
YOUR _INHERITANCE_ FUND
This is to intimate you of a very important information which will be of a great help to redeem you from all the difficulties you have been experiencing in getting your long overdue payment, due to excessive demand for money from you by both corrupt Bank officials and Courier Companies after which your fund remain unpaid to you.I'm Ms. Renee Hill, a highly placed official of the Office of Federal Financial Management(OFFM)s. It may interest you to know that reports
have reached our office by so many correspondences on the uneasy way in which people like you are treated by Various Banks and Courier Companies/ Diplomat across Europe to Africa and Asia /UK. We have decided to put a stop to that and that is why I was appointed to handle your transaction herein United States of America.
All Governmental and Non-Governmental prostates, NGOs, Finance Companies, Banks, Security Companies and Courier companies which have been in contact with you of late have been instructed to back off from your transaction and you have been advised NOT to respond to them anymore since the Office of Federal Financial Management(OFFM)s is now directly in charge of your payment. Your name appeared in our payment schedule list of beneficiaries that will receive their funds in this first quarter payment of the year because we only transfer funds twice in a year according to our banking regulation. We apologize for the delay of your payment and please stop communicating with any office now and pay attention to our office payment accordingly. so 
everything will cost $100 USD only for you to confirm your payment without any problem. and buy iTunes card or steam wallet to send immediately
Now your new Payment, United nation Approval No; UN5685P, White House Approved No: WH44CV, Reference No.-35460021, Allocation No: 674632 Password No: 339331, Pin Code No: 55674 and your Certificate of Merit Payment No: 103, Released Code No: 0763; Immediate (OFFM) Telex confirmation No: -1114433; Secret Code No: XXTN013. Your part payment inheritance fund is USD$10Million.  Having received these vital payment numbers, therefore you are qualified now to receive and confirm your payment with the Office of Federal Financial Management(OFFM)s USA Region immediately within the next 168hrs. We assure you that your payment will get to you as long as you follow my directives and instructions. We have decided to give you a CODE, THE CODE IS: 601. Please, any time you receive a mail with the name Ms.Renee Hill, check if there is CODE (601) if the code is not written,please delete the message from your box!
You are hereby advised NOT to remit further payment to any institutions with respect to your transaction as your fund will be transferred to you directly from our source. I hope this is clear.Any action contrary to this instruction is at your own risk. Respond to this e-mail on (
holdera190@gmail.com
) with immediate effect and we shall give you further details on how your fund will be released.
Respectfully,
Ms. Renee Hill, Office of Public Affairs
(OFFM)s CODE IS: 601

subject: Re: Office of Federal Financial Ma
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an interesting piece of information. However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message.

You mentioned something about an inheritance fund and a payment schedule list. Could you please elaborate more on these? How did my name appear on this list?

Also, you mentioned that I should not respond to any other offices but yours. May I know why this is so? 

I noticed that there are several codes and numbers included in your message. What are these for? And how do they relate to the payment process?

Lastly, you mentioned a fee of USD for confirmation of my payment. Could you explain what this fee is for and why it's necessary?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Eric
